product_name: Swix Nordic Travelvise Ski Vise Set
long_description: This versatile, easy-to-use Swix Nordic ski vise set is ideal for use in your shop or on the road. 3 C-clamp screw mounts easily attach to workbench or almost any flat surface. Ski binding fastens to center C-clamp at binding closure, fixing it in a stable position regardless of ski camber angles. C-clamps hold classical and skating skis. Rubber grip pads on end clamps keep ski stable while you work.
short_description: This versatile, easy-to-use Swix Nordic ski vise set is ideal for use in your shop or on the road.
